about_the_game:
"The RPG for Everyone" is a unique simulation game where you step into the shoes of a developer to create a classic RPG.
Experience the ups and downs of game development as you work toward crafting a masterpiece that everyone will love.

Game Overview

Guided by the renowned game creator SECHAN BARAM, players embark on a journey to design and develop their very own RPG masterpiece.
But the road to success is not without challenges.
Once your game is released, it will face critiques and feedback from review sites and players.
Your ultimate goal? Address these critiques, refine your game step by step, and strive to achieve a perfect user score of 100.

Can you create a game that satisfies everyone and avoids criticism?

Key Features

  • Game Development Simulation:
    Oversee every aspect of creating a traditional RPG, from design decisions to final release.

  • Realistic Developer Challenges:
    Handle player feedback and critiques to continually improve your game.

  • Engaging Single-Player Mode:
    Face compelling challenges and make impactful decisions as you build your RPG.

  • Guidance from SECHAN BARAM:
    Receive valuable advice and mentorship from a legendary game developer throughout your journey.
